trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetMsmqSecurityElement" /> class encapsulates the MSMQ security features available when using the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding" /> binding.
trans-unit.target: La clase <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetMsmqSecurityElement" /> encapsula las características de seguridad de MSMQ disponibles al utilizar el enlace <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: Objects of this type are created by creating an instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding> binding.
trans-unit.target: Los objetos de este tipo se crean mediante la creación de una instancia del enlace <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding>.

trans-unit.source: You can then use this object to reference all of the various security settings related to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding> binding.
trans-unit.target: Después puede usar este objeto para hacer referencia a todos los valores de seguridad relacionados con el enlace <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetMsmqSecurityElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetMsmqSecurityElement" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverMsmq" /> instance that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding" /> binding.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la instancia <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverMsmq" /> asociada al enlace <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverMsmq" /> instance that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding" /> binding.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverMsmq> instance encapsulates the SOAP message security settings.
trans-unit.target: La instancia <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverMsmq> encapsula la configuración de seguridad de mensajes SOAP.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqSecurityMode" /> instance that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding" /> binding.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la instancia <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqSecurityMode" /> asociada al enlace <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqSecurityMode" /> instance that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding" /> binding.
This property determines the type of security used by the associated `NetMsmqBinding`.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad determina el tipo de seguridad usado por el `NetMsmqBinding`asociado.

trans-unit.source: The following list describes the acceptable values:
trans-unit.target: La lista siguiente describe los valores aceptables:
`Message`: se utilizará seguridad basada en mensaje.

trans-unit.source: `Both` - Both message-based security and transport security will be used.
trans-unit.target: `Both`: se utilizarán seguridad basada en mensaje y seguridad de transporte.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqTransportSecurityElement" /> element that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding" /> binding.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el elemento <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqTransportSecurityElement" /> asociada al enlace <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity" /> instance that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding" /> binding.
This property enables access to Msmq Transport security settings.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad permite el acceso a la configuración de seguridad de transporte de Msmq.
